DOC.criteria: Patients admit Emergency Department clinical suspicion acute coronary syndrome i.e . chest pain pain radiating arm , back , jaw , throat low teeth . Chest pain must dominant symptom may may combine e.g . dyspnea , nausea , anxiousness palpitation . Age > = 18 year ST elevation MI Age < 18 year Patients able give inform consent Patients suffer terminal illness ( life expectance < 1 month ) Patients already include study Patients stabilize local hospital refer second opinion e.g . coronary angiography
